reviews.review: This is probably one of the best Valve games ever.

Got 1 hour into it and accidentally opened the gesture menu in single player and now the game is completely broken. Every save is corrupt and when i load any of them i cant move and it pulls up the gesture menu.

Guys. It's PORTAL 2. If that wasn't enough to convince you to play the game, then trust me it's worth getting. You'll laugh, scream, and launch yourself through portals at the speed of light. Happy testing!

Great game, absolute classic. Would recommend to anyone in the history of the universe.
Awesome nostalgic feeling playing this game again, would highly recommend to anyone who like physic's based puzzle games, or has played half-life, or the first version of this game.

This is an amazing game! The single-player mode is long and fun, the puzzles are great, and it really wraps up well. Portal Co-op seemed like a bad idea, but this somehow made it work well! There are three big issues with the game I do want to address though. The first issue is that in most of Chapter 6, it is very hard to find your way around and figure out where to go. I know Portal 2's puzzles are supposed to be hard, but puzzles don't work if guess and check is the only solution! The second issue is that with some mice and controllers, gesturing is broken. Holding down Q brings up the gesture menu, but using the mouse just makes you look around! I have found a way to circumvent this, but it is super annoying. You need to press T while holding Q to make the mouse work. The third issue is that the chamber editor is very limited. To make a proper test chamber, you need more than just a few objects. There is a good way to extend the editor though, which is to install some software called BEEMod 2. Most versions have a lot of errors, and I found BEEMod 2 Pre-Release 25 to work best. Overall, this is a great game and if you have $10 to spare (you probably do), you should really consider buying this game.
the graphics and gameplay are amazing.
Um jogo incrível, em questão de História e Puzzles é inquestionável, a jogabilidade deixa a desejar, mas quem gosta desse estilo de jogo não vejo porquê não comprar.

Merita assolutamente. Consiglio di giocare prima l'1.

Oyun tek kişilik olsun, eşli olsun, arkadaşınızla oynamak olsun, her şekliyle güzel. Çoğunluk olarak bulmacalardan oluşmakta ve zeki oyuncuların bile zorlayıp hile yapmalarına sebep olmakta. Eşli modu gayet güzel, hikaye mod bittikten sonra o tarafa geçebilirsiniz. Eşli modda arkadaşlarınız ile güzel anlar, beyin yakan bölümler ve taret yok etmeceler oynayacaksınız. Fiyatını sorarsanız 18 TL ye pek deymebilir lakin indirimde almak daha mantıklı olacaktır. Aradan vakit geçtikten sonra tekrar oynayasınız geliyor. Bazı ufak buglar olsada, oyunun güzelliğini değiştirmeye yetmez.

This is the best game ever created by Valve.. The story, the boss battle, everything is just perfect. I am even a huge fan of all the modders out there who make custom shit like portal stories: mel and etc

Portal 2 еще один шедевр Valve который никого не оставить равнодушным. Обычная головоломка скрывающая за собой мрачную истории комплекса Aperture science, и оставляющая наедине нас с собой и вопросами, кто мы? как мы здесь оказались? почему мы проходим тесты? кто такая GladOs? и почему тортик ложь?
Gioco fantastico! Non che uno dei miei preferiti, livelli intriganti e divertenti + storia fantastica = gioco bellissimo. Inoltre i livelli sviluppati dagli utenti lo rendono un gioco quasi eterno
wszystko mi sie podobalo prosze pani ;)

Игра очень крутая! Я даже был её фанатом! Но есть одно НО! Иногда бывают баги с озвучкой - например: Речь модуля Уитли в некоторых местах не проигрывается, некоторые фразы ГЛаДОС или Уитли пропускаются и проигрываются только после всех цитат. В целом всё очень классно!
(Жаль что PORTAL 3 никогда не выйдет)

Un des rare jeu intelligent. Pas de violence, une ambiance magnifique. Le 1 était trop court et consistait à une succession de puzzle. Celui-çi rentre dans l'histoire. Addictif au point d'attendre chaque fin de mission et début pour écouter les informations lié à l'histoire. Les solutions sont de plus en plus complexes mais on insiste, on veut savoir.
Ce jeu est accessible pour tous le monde et mérite le titre de meilleur jeu de tous les temps.
On y rejoue avec plaisir quelques années plus tard.
Le seul reproche ? une actualisation serait pas mal avec des graphismes actuels. Mais "à l'époque", cela déchirait ;-)
Vraiment, n'hésitez pas, fonçez, ce jeu dépasse tout
如果你脑子还被谁僵尸吃的话 可以尝试一下 千万别逞强奥
